gen:link.msg:message: `MarketValue` gerapporteerd met `ClassesOfTypesOfRealEstateAxis` en `TypesOfRealEstateMember` MOET gelijk zijn aan `CommercialRealEstateInExploitation` zonder `ClassesOfTypesOfRealEstateAxis` en `TypesOfRealEstateMember`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_MarketValueInRentedStateTotalNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfTypesOfRealEstateAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_MarketValueInRentedStateTotalNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfTypesOfRealEstateAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_MarketValueInRentedStateTotalNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfTypesOfRealEstateAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_MarketValueInRentedStateTotalNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfTypesOfRealEstateAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NumberOfUltimoReportingYear` met `TypesOfRealEstateMember` MOET gelijk zijn aan + `NumberOfUltimoReportingYear` met `UnitsInExploitationMember`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_MarketValueInRentedStateTotalNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_Prt101VariableMembers1_Set00')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_MarketValueInRentedStateTotalNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_Prt101VariableMembers1_Set00 return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_MarketValueInRentedStateTotalNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_Prt101VariableMembers1_Set01')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_MarketValueInRentedStateTotalNonDaebCompoundHousingDvi_Prt101VariableMembers1_Set01 return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
